short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension by infihire to add leads directly in their system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InfiHire - Talent Suite Extension. Use this extension to add candidate lead directly to Infihire CRM from other talent sourcing platforms in a single click
